resources.string: Please update to the latest version to continue using this application, .
To use this application, please allow "Alarms and Reminders" from the Settings screen (please turn the setting ON)
Settings cannot be changed while the lens is in use
Previous day notification is not available when 1-day lens is set.
Protect your eye health by using contact lenses properly
Do you really want to exchange the lenses?

To begin, set up your contact lenses and notifications by pressing the "Lens Settings" button (red frame).\n If you press "Start" without these settings, the settings for 2-Week lenses (no notifications) will be applied.
On this screen, you can set the "contact lens type," "period of use," "notification date," "notification time," and "contact lens power.
You can choose from "2-week" and "1-month" contact lenses. In addition, you can also specify the length of time you would like to use the lenses between 1 and 31 days.
he notification date can be selected as either the day of the event or the day before. The notification time can be set in 1-minute increments.
Contact lens power can range from -8.0 to -3.0.
Click the OK button to save the settings so far.
How to set up a reminder
To start the reminder, press the "Start" button (red frame).
Once the reminder is started, the "Start" button becomes the "Change Lens" button. Also, once you start the reminder, you will not be able to change the settings until you exchange the lenses.
The number of days remaining is updated daily at midnight.
If the number of days remaining is not updated, please set the lens again with the desired number of days and start the reminder again.
For other application features and notes (important), please see Other.
Click the "Help" button (red frame) from the top screen to view the help screen.
On this screen, you can refer to "Terms of Use," "Help (How to use)," "Notification Settings," "Contact Us," "Version," and "Change Theme Color".
This application can be used in different light/dark modes by pressing the icon in the upper left corner of the top screen.
You can change the theme color in the dialog that appears when you click "Change Theme Color" on the Help screen.

App Widgets are available in "image type" and "progress bar type". The image type displays the number of days remaining for contact lenses. The progress bar type displays a progress bar showing the number of days remaining and the date when the lenses will be exchanged.
1. After updating the application, please recreate the app widget.
2. If the message "Cannot load widget" appears when placing the app widget on the home screen, please uninstall the application and try again.
If the above problems persist, please contact us.
This application means this smartphone application currently in use (the "Application").
Customers shall use the Application upon agreeing to these Terms of Use.

1．All copyrights and other rights related to this application belong to the developer of this application (hereinafter referred to as the "Developer") or the right holder who is licensed by the Developer.

2．You may use the Application only for the purpose designated by the Developer. Upon request from the developer of the application, the customer shall promptly cease use of the application or delete the application from the smartphone of customer.

3．You shall not reproduce, duplicate, transfer, modify, or reverse engineer the information downloaded to your smartphone through the Application or the Service, and you shall not allow any third party to perform such acts.
4. Suspension, change, etc. of the provision of this app
The developer may suspend or terminate the provision of this application, change the contents of this service, or modify this application at any time without the notice to the customer.

1．Defects in this application, defects related to the operation of this application (including errors and deviations in the displayed information) The developer shall not be liable for any disadvantage, disadvantage of data loss, or any other disadvantage incurred by the customer due to the impact of this application on the smartphone, or the inability of the customers to use this application normally.

2．In addition to the preceding paragraph, the Developer shall not be liable for the unavailability of this application in any of the following cases, or for any damages resulting from such unavailability
（1）In the case of unavoidable circumstances such as natural disasters, measures taken by courts of law or other public authorities, etc.
（2）In the case of a communication line or system failure despite the reasonable security measures
（3）In the case of fingerprint authentication, passcode authentication, etc. were illegally executed.
（4）If the reason is attributable to a third party other than the Developer
3．When you upload, download, or otherwise transfer information using this Application, you agree to allow us to transfer such information by electromagnetic means.
6. Improvement of the environment for use, etc.

1．The customer shall use this application (including the downloading of this application). The customer shall prepare, at the responsibility of customer and expense, the telecommunications equipment, software, telecommunications lines, and other environment necessary for the use of the Application (including the downloading of the Application).

2．Use of this application (including downloading of this application) The customer shall be responsible for communication charges incurred in connection with the use of this application (including downloading of this application).

3．Customers shall maintain appropriate information security, including the prevention of computer virus infection, unauthorized access, and information leakage, in accordance with their own usage environment, by referring to the information provided by the Developer.
4．When disposing of the smartphone on which this application is installed or otherwise terminating the use of this application, the customer shall be sure to delete this application.
7. Mutatis mutandis application of the Code
With respect to this application, matters not set forth in these Terms and Conditions shall be governed by the other terms of developer and conditions.

1．Each provision and other conditions of this Agreement shall be subject to change in accordance with the provisions of Article 548–4 of the Civil Code (Japanese law) when there are deemed to be reasonable grounds, such as changes in financial or other circumstances.

2．Any change in the preceding paragraph shall be made known to the public by publicly announcing the change, the content of the revised provisions, and the effective date of the change via the Internet or other appropriate means.

3．The changes in the preceding two paragraphs shall apply from the effective date specified at the time of publication, and a reasonable period of time shall be allowed between the date of publication and the effective date, depending on the content of the changes.
アップデート情報 Ver %s
新機能 アプリウィジェット
Ver 2.0.0 からアプリウィジェットが使えるようになりました。
アプリウィジェットには「画像タイプ」「プログレスバータイプ」の2種類があります。
画像タイプ…コンタクトレンズの残り使用可能日数を表示
プログレスバータイプ…残り使用可能日数を表すプログレスバーとレンズ交換日を表示
アプリアイコン変更機能の廃止
本アプリの使いやすさを考えて、Ver 2.0.0 からこれまで利用可能だったアプリアイコン変更機能を廃止させていただきました。
この機能の代わりにアプリウィジェット機能をお使いください。
今後とも本アプリをよろしくお願いいたします。
